taskbody.context: After the test suite execution, to view your test reports, do as follows:

step.cmd: Go to the Reports folder in the Test Explorer panel.

li.p: When running a test suite that uses variables and bindings at the test case level, the total number of executed test cases in test reports is the number of executed iterations. In the above example, we run a test case with 3 different sets of data, we can see the results of three executed test cases in the test reports.

info.p: Alternatively, you can also view your reports and details in <your-project-folder>/Reports. Katalon Studio supports exporting test reports into different formats, such as HTML, CSV, PDF, and JUnit. You can learn more about exporting reports here: Generate reports.
